short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces mentions of Donald Trump's supporters, with the hyper-accurate phrase, 'really stupid people'

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the term 'Trump Supporters' and a few similar variations of the term with the phrase 'Really stupid people'.
